summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Saturday 15 January to end of Saturday 15 January GMT
description: Saturday is expected to be dry, cold and cloudy. With winds picking up over the weekend, dispersion of locally emitted pollution should improve when compared with recent days.  Back trajectories are currently indicating little import, but instead a recirculation of air around the South East of England.<br/><br/>Overall, air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/><br/><br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
